about_the_game:
Assault on the Red Falcon – Dive into the X8 Contra Super Wall Storm game mode and mow through waves of enemies up to the final boss, Super Wall!

  • Partner Up: Play solo or partner up with another player to compete for the best score on the leaderboard!

  • Attack Supercharge: Use hero abilities and the versatile power of your combat gun to go on the offensive against Red Falcon’s forces!

  • Stats Up: Shoot power-up capsules for pickups to boost your firepower and durability!

  • Skystriker: Shoot power-up capsules floating in the sky for a rare chance to unleash the ultimate power-up!

  • Enemies Reloaded: Face off against a variety of iconic Contra enemies, such as Bird Human Garth, and new threats like the Armadillo Bomb and Armadillo Blade, all while battling your way through the digital Red Falcon base!

  • Win Big: Complete runs to unlock new prizes and Freeplay Park toys during exclusive Contra in-game events

The following content is included: 

  • Unlimited access to the Contra: Super Wall Storm game mode

  • “Contra Collab” splat tag

  • Exclusive prizes during select in-game events

Once downloaded, you can enter and play the X8 Contra: Super Wall Storm game mode from within Freeplay Park.

All content from the base X8 game is also included.

  • Enemies Reloaded: Face off against a variety of iconic Contra enemies, such as Bird Human Garth, and new threats like the Armadillo Bomb and Armadillo Blade, all while battling your way through the digital Red Falcon base!

subs.option_text: X8 Contra Game Access Pack - $9.99 USD

package_groups.title: Buy X8 Contra Game Access Pack

short_description: X8 joins forces with Contra, the iconic run-and-gun side scrolling game series, to bring you all the adrenaline of the original game! Join a whole new experience as you assault Red Falcon’s military base!
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
